description.plain: Joseph Anthony Somers-Morales, known by his stage name SoMo, is an American R&B singer and songwriter from Denison, Texas. He is most famous for his single called Ride.

body.plain: Joseph Anthony Somers-Morales, known by his stage name SoMo, is an American R&B singer and songwriter from Denison, Texas. He is most famous for his single called Ride.

songs.lyrics:
45 ContributorsRide Lyrics[Intro]
Woah, woah, woah, yeah

All the way down to your feet
